name: The Pixel Kingdom (Archive)
description:
You wake up in a strange area that seems familiar, but you can't just put your finger on it. You look behind you and see a music box playing a tune from your childhood. Was this all made for me? Did I do something? No time to ponder, you think to yourself and look behind the music box you see a light door. You try the knob, but it was locked. So now, it's time to find a key and get out of here.

This game was made in three days just for fun. Even though this is the final build for the game, the collision system might need a little work, but hey, it works for now. If you want more games like this with a top-down scroller environment, then give me some ideas for my next game!

This game was made back in November of 2020 and was originally posted on Gamejolt. I decided to upload it here as an archive, cause why not :P
